short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organise and share products. Create shoppable pages and share links to boost engagement. Welcome to [This]

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension empowers you to seamlessly save, organise, and share your favourite products from multiple merchants. With just a single click, you can add items to your collections while browsing your favourite online stores. Perfect for both casual shoppers and passionate creators, our platform enables you to curate your unique style and share it with the world.

Features:

Save Products Easily: Add our extension to your Chrome browser and save items with one click.

Organise Collections: Create sections and collections to keep your products neatly organised.

Share Your Style: Embed social content and make your collections public to share with others.

Cross-Device Viewing: Enjoy your curated collections on any device.
Join our community and bring your style to life!
